item.title: Hugo搭建blog
item.description: Hugo quick start 下载最新的hugo并安装 #for ubuntu sudo dpkg -i hexo-version-xxx.deb 生成站点 hugo new site blog-hugo 下载hugo-theme-even cd blog-hugo git submodule add https://github.com/olOwOlo/hugo-theme-even themes/even 替换blog-hugo/confi
